title: Friends House Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located inside Friends House, lunch buffet includes a vegan soup and vegan dish daily. Mondays are meat-free. Vegan desserts and ice cream are available. Menu changes daily to reflect seasonal produce which is sourced locally, organic and fair trade. Has gluten free options.
